alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gadsden; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 1:25PM EDT until May 06 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/. * At 125 PM EDT/1225 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles west of Blountstown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Chattahoochee, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, Fountain, Hosford, Rosedale, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Clio, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill and Estiffanulga. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.
